Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at IFA Catarina Hotel in San Bartolome de Tirajana (Playa del Ingles), you'll be minutes from CITA Shopping Center and close to Maspalomas Beach. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Yumbo Shopping Center and Kasbah Shopping Center.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 402 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars. Rooms have private balconies. Wireless Internet access (surcharge) keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Dip into one of the 3 outdoor swimming pools or enjoy other recreational amenities including outdoor tennis courts and a health club. This hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and babysitting/childcare.

Dining
All-inclusive rates are available at this hotel. Meals and beverages at onsite dining establishments are included in all-inclusive rates. Charges may be applied for dining at some restaurants, special dinners and dishes, some beverages, and other amenities.

Enjoy a meal at one of the hotel's dining establishments, which include 2 restaurants and a coffee shop/café. From your room, you can also access room service (during limited hours). Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour front desk, multilingual staff, and laundry facilities. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
All-inclusive rates are available at this hotel. Meals and beverages at onsite dining establishments are included in all-inclusive rates. Charges may be applied for dining at some restaurants, special dinners and dishes, some beverages, and other amenities.

Enjoy a meal at one of the hotel's dining establishments, which include 2 restaurants and a coffee shop/café. From your room, you can also access room service (during limited hours). Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar.


Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

With a stay at IFA Catarina Hotel in San Bartolome de Tirajana (Playa del Ingles), you'll be minutes from CITA Shopping Center and close to Maspalomas Beach. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Yumbo Shopping Center and Kasbah Shopping Center.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

CITA Shopping Center - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Maspalomas Beach - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Yumbo Shopping Center - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Kasbah Shopping Center - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi
Maspalomas Golf Course - 1.7 km / 1.1 mi
Maspalomas Dunes - 1.9 km / 1.2 mi
Holiday World Maspalomas - 2.1 km / 1.3 mi
Maspalomas Lighthouse - 2.5 km / 1.6 mi
Las Burras Beach - 3 km / 1.9 mi
Playa de San Agustin - 3 km / 1.9 mi
Meloneras Beach - 3.4 km / 2.1 mi
Aqualand Maspalomas - 4.3 km / 2.7 mi
El Aguila Beach - 5.7 km / 3.5 mi
Palmitos Park - 10.4 km / 6.4 mi
Puerto Rico Marina - 13.6 km / 8.5 mi

The preferred airport for IFA Catarina Hotel is Las Palmas (LPA-Gran Canaria) - 27.9 km / 17.3 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
